p.s: Obama gave a speech in Istanbul at 7 April 2009 at the Culture and Arts Center of Mimar Sinan Fine Arts University in Tophane.
He gave the speech before the open discussion started.
The speech is about the importance of intercultural understanding and student exchanges.
At the beginning of his speech he says that he came to Turkey because he trytries to rebuilding a relationship between the United States and the people of the Muslim world.
He also told that he is proud to see a new spirit of activism.
In addition he findfinds it good that young people are engaged and that they informed about the world around them.
In the future he will find new ways to connect young Americans to young people all around the world.
This will he do by supporting opportunities to learn new languages.
Moreover he will welcoming students from other countries.
In the endindingending of his speech, Obama says that everyone can choose to advance a prosperity that is shared by all people.
